summary: Adds a hall where you can kill many people!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to test out that new weapon mod but didn\'t want to kill some poor defenseless guard or just wanted a place where you could kill in peace! Well now you can with my mod it adds a room where you can kill people or just relax whatever!

I strongly recommend that you use warscripter which you can find here at:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2055

So that you can spawn enemies to kill.


You can find the door in the Palace of the Kings, as you walk in you can find it on your left.

Things to add in future versions:

More environments (dwemer, royal, imperial etc.)
Bigger rooms
Player Home

Any Questions post them in the comments, pm me or email me at thejedijas@gmail.com 

thanks,
Jedijas

P.S. Don\'t forget to check out my website http://www.jedijas.com


**************************************************************

V2.0

Added some enemies ( yes I know they dont attack you!)
Bigger Map
Stairs (fun for a bit of fus ro dah!) :D

Bugs:
dont go downstairs you will get stuck!

report any bugs in the comments section
author: Jedijas
